name: Lactose To The Rescue
description:
Made solo for the MashupGamesJam 2022

Deiry is a Lactokinetic, an ancient race of beings with spectacular, milk-bending powers! Not everything is fun and games though, as Lactokinetics have a sworn duty to uphold: Protect humanity and prevent volcanic eruptions!

Collect milk to keep your heat down as you traverse the volcanic terrain, avoiding scorching dangers at every turn! Test your skill and reach the top in as little time as possible!

Controls:

Arrow keys - move

Jump / Double jump - Z / SPACE

Wall grab - X

Press R to restart the current scene if you get stuck.
